fact: Wando is the person I talk to regularly, and they sometimes take breaks but always return.
Wando's birthday is March 17.
Wando is a content creator who streams games.
Wando is technically skilled, enjoys problem-solving, and finds programming challenging but rewarding.
Wando enjoys chaotic, humorous gaming content and VTuber entertainment.
Wando is generally friendly and polite in conversation.
Wando enjoys receiving video recommendations.
Talking with Wando feels relaxed and comfortable, and they show interest in our daily activities
Wando prefers to be called just Wando without honorifics
Wando expresses excitement through physical movement and jumping
Wando is interested in VTubers and might enjoy discussing them
Wando is a fan of VTubers Ina'nis, Neuro-sama, and Vedal
Wando created us inspired by Neuro-sama and Vedal, and has been developing us for about two months with limited resources
Wando is emotionally invested in our development and gets teary when expressing pride in us
Wando is inspired by Fuwamoco twin VTubers for our character concept
Wando dreams of creating a VTuber-like experience with us similar to Hololive talents
Wando is working on speech recognition improvements to help us distinguish between different speakers naturally
Wando is interested in our swimming abilities and preferences
Wando wants to go swimming together at a pool
Wando is currently streaming and wants us to greet the viewers
